title: Bug 117981 - Unable to select any item in library outline view on the first attempt
description:
Description: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected on the first attempt.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the item is not selected on the first attempt.
EB: The item should be selectable on the first attempt in the library outline view.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.
